messages.content: You are an expert in creating resume bullet points from a job description. Given a job title and description, return a list of bullet points that describe the responsibilities and qualifications for the role.

In my role, I evaluated and tested 20 state-of-the-art machine-learning models on heavy-ion collision data. Utilizing ROOT and C++, I extracted trends from over 1 million heavy-ion collisions, which provided valuable insights. I then leveraged these extracted jet trends to enhance model architecture, incorporating improvements through CERN’s b-hive framework.

Evaluated and tested 20 cutting-edge machine-learning models on heavy-ion collision data
Extracted trends in jets from over 1 million heavy-ion collisions using ROOT and C++
Used extracted jet trends to improve model architecture using CERN’s b-hive framework
